message: Because they are racist and messy...it's a lot of things they can do and say to create peace and harmony

No matter how you plan to vote, this should bother you immensely. That the Russians would SO want Trump president, that they'd pull a stunt like this. If they can get into the DNC, they can certainly get into the RNC and if you think there weren't incriminating emails over there, well, I've got some ocean front property in AZ you may be interested in. A foreign country should have no part in deciding an American election.
Take off your shoes and boots before entering your house's main areas to keep carpets clean. Buy a carpet washing machine and use that to remove deeply embedded dirt.

Our president should tell these BLM rioters to go home already- they are disturbing the peace of our country. We have real problems to deal with - like Homeland Security. Look what's happening in the world - ISIS is terrorizing every nation! Their racial issues are on them at this point. They haven't the facts to even back them up. They have blood on their hands! They should be arrested by the hundred at this point, not applauded or appeased. Here are some facts: An African-American Harvard Economist, Roland G. Frye, Jr., just published findings that there is no racial differences between the deadly shootings of whites and blacks by law enforcement in America. He began his study because he was angered by black men being shot by white cops. But his study surprisingly found that police officers use deadly force when they perceive a threat, regardless of skin color. This data undercuts the entire BLM's argument. He summarized by stating """"Yes, there are some instances of criminal acts, but they are far and in between,"""" and """"they are not disproportionate by race.""""
Tom Holmes human gooda

I'm sorry you had to deal with stupid security officers and store owners... ; however, maybe that Asian salon owner wasn't being racist but rather did not have the education to cut coarser hair and was knowledgeable enough to know where her skills lacked ability. I've had terrible haircuts because the stylist didn't have the knowledge to cut my funky asian hair and didn't inform me of that. Unfortunately not all salon schools or hair stylists learn to cut all types of hair. If she was being racist I'm sorry. Personally i wouldn't want to support her business because either she's racist or needs more training.
Too much of a coincidence to be a coincidence.
So sorry to hear that

I celebrate this time of year for the same reason your church decided to back in around 350 CE ...the winter solstice; a solar event which has been celebrated since the dawn of mankind, many tens and possibly hundreds of thousands of years before the papyrus scribblings of some fearful desert dwellers... It really doesn't matter how un-Christlike you people act by trying to exclude the secular world from the joy and fellowship of the season...because: history. Happy holidays, I hope you have a nice Christmas. I'm pretty sure your Jesus would want EVERYONE to enjoy the season...even us heathens. Sorry you don't like the idea of sharing something that your religion stole in the first place.
